title: Our fragile coast
creator_credit: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre and David Hughes
brief_description: Examines the twin processes of erosion and deposition along the Victorian coast. These areas include Port Cambell, the Gippsland Lakes, Ninety-Mile Beach, and Port Phillip Bay. Sea-Beach poem by Judith Wright.
creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre and David Hughes
